HypervisorState.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PENDING | ONLINE | OFFLINE | ERROR  
Update requires: No interruption

SyncMetadataStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PENDING | IN_PROGRESS | FAILED | SUCCEEDED  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[^\x00]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Host.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 50  
Maximum Length: 500  
Pattern: ^(^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):kms:([a-zA-Z0-9-]+):([0-9]+):(key|alias)/(\S+)$)|(^alias/(\S+)$)$  
Update requires: Replacement

LogGroupArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^$|^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):logs:([a-zA-Z0-9-]+):([0-9]+):log-group:[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\/\.]+:\*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Password.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[ -~]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

Username.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[ -\.0-\[\]-~]*[!-\.0-\[\]-~][ -\.0-\[\]-~]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

HypervisorArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 50  
Maximum Length: 500  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov):backup-gateway(:[a-zA-Z-0-9]+){3}\/[a-zA-Z-0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
